sqoop.arg: SELECT LkInvIsolatedReasonMSTID,InvIsolatedReasonID,MachineStageTypeID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_LkInvIsolatedReasonMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionAttributeTypeID,AcquisitionVariantID,AttributeTypeID,EntryOrder,Formula,IsExplicitStep, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionAttributeType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,AcquisitionID,MeasurementSetTagProfileID,PartInstanceTagProfileID,DefectTagProfileID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RfDataCollectionFreqID,DataCollectionPeriod,IsRetired,AcqPlan,VMTPID,CauseActionTPID,Variant,PartTypeID,RevisionNo,IsEdited,HeadAlias,CauseTagListID,ActionTagListID,IsMeasuredWhenProduced,IsInvPackCheck,IsEBATrigger, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionSubTypeID,ActionSubType,ActionTypeID,Description,SubActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format,IsRetired, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionSubType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetID,ParentAssetID,SubAssetID,Lvl,SortOrder,Comments,AssetLevelID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,RfVarGridStyleID,IsPITCols,IsPISNoCol,RfAttrGridStyleID,IsStepGrid,IsAttrSkipStep,ShowAttrInfoTip,UseAttrImagePicker,AttrGridContextMenu,IsPISerial,AutoGenerateSerialNo,PITSampling,MSTSampling,VAInterlace,IsExplicitHS,SampleSizeMode,OnDataCommitGoTo,IsDisableOOSWarnings,StepEditPolicy,DisableKeyboardOverride,ChainToStopped,DisplayPlan,AttrPassFailDefault,VariableSaveMode,AttrCellClick, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AVDataEntryOptions WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CommentsID,LoginID,DT,Subject,Comments, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Comments WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariableTypeID,JobCommentLength,RfTorqueDirectionID,RfCycleEndTimeID,ThresholdTorque,RfMeasurementTypeID,RfFrequencyResponseID,UnitID,AuditAngle,CrnAdapterID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CRN_AcquisitionVariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT DocumentID,FileName,Description,MimeType,Attachment,UploadDT,LoginID,DocumentTypeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Document WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT FaultStatusID,FaultStatus,Description,RfFaultStatusID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.FaultStatus WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT InventoryUsageID,StartUsingComments,StopUsingComments,StartLoginID,StopLoginID,OpenedStartDT,OpenedEndDT,SavedStartDT,SavedEndDT,OriginalLoginID,EditedInventoryUsageID,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 4 as "org_id", 'SPTT' as "org_name" FROM dbo.InventoryUsage_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LineInfoID,CellsProduced, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineInfo_custom WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeTypeGroupID,AttributeTypeID,LkATATGID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkATATG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartDefID,Sequence,LkCSetCDefID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKCSetCDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIStepID,WorkInstructionStepID,DocumentID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMachineStagePrinterID,MachineStageID,PrinterID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMachineStagePrinter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartTypeID,OperationTypeID,IsInventoryCarriedOver,LkOpTPartTConsumedID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTPartTConsumed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkRootCauseActionID,RootCauseID,ActionID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkRootCauseAction WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolStateID,ToolCavityID,RfToolCavityStatusID,ToolCavityStateReasonID,IsCavityChangeState,LkTSTCID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkTSTC WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkWIRMSetReqID,WorkInstructionResultID,MeasurementSetRequiredID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkWIRMSetReq WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MachineStageTypeID,Name,Description,MachineStageTypeCode, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT MaintenancePartPlannedID,MaintenanceProcedureStepID,PartID,PlannedCost,IsOptional,Quantity,UnitID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenancePartPlanned WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureStepID,MaintenanceProcedureStep,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,StepOrder,SubPartID,Component,RfMaintenanceCheckTypeID,RfSpecialActionTypeID,Test,USL,LSL,PersonnelGroupID,SupplierID,Nom,Units,DecPlaces, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedureStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MeasurementSetID,ActualAttrSampleSize,AcquisitionContextID,IsEdited,DT,AcquisitionID,MachineStageID,RfAcquisitionClassID,RevisionNo,PartID,JobID,ResumeStep,InventoryPackID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MeasurementSet WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCClientID,OPCClient,ComputerID,ModifiedDT,LastUpdateDT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCClient WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCItemHistoryID,OPCItemID,UpdatedDT,RawValue,Value,Quality,CommittedDT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCItemHistory WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCTextID,OPCItemID,Description,ModifiedDT,LoginID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCText WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartTypeID,PartType,Description,PartTypeCode,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID,RfInventoryAccountingModeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductTypeID,Name,ProductTypeCode,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapReasonGroupID,ScrapReasonGroup,Description, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ScrapReasonGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftPatternID,ShiftPattern,PatternDuration,IsPatternDirty,IsCustomPeriod, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftPattern WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartDefID,VariableTypeID,SPCRuleID,RfStudyTypeID,GroupingSize,MovingRange,SPCCalcStyleID,RfGroupingID,NGroupMarkerID,CpBasedOnID,CLBasedOnID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCRuleID,SPCRule,TAGMSTYPE1ID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagDefectID,IndividualDefectID,TagTypeID,TagValue,DT,X,Y, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagDefect WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeID,TagTree, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTree WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftID,MachineStageID,JobID,Downtime, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TMP_Job_Shift_Downtime WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolCavityID,CavityNumber,CavityName,ToolID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolCavity WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolUsageID,JobID,MachineStageID,ToolID,FromDT,ToDT,ToolPosition,ToolChangeReasonID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,OperationID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolUsage WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT UnitCountTypeID,UnitCountType,Description,MachineStageTypeID,DefaultUnitID,IsQuantityIn,IsQuantityOut,IsMaintenanceCount,IsConvertableToBaseUnits,AssetCountTypeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.UnitCountType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT VariableTypeGroupID,Name,Description,VariableTypeGroupCode,IsSmartGroup,SmartGroupPattern, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableTypeGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WORefID,WOReference, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WORef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Location.LocationID, Location.Location, Location.LocationTypeID, Location.IsRetired, Location.MaxQuantity, Location.LocationCode, Location.Description, LocationType.LocationType, LocationType.LocationTypeCode, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM Location FULL JOIN LocationType ON (Location.LocationID = LocationType.LocationTypeID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
